ComicInfo.Title: The Crushing Conquer-Lord!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Crushing Conquer-Lord!: The Moon Knight tries to stop the Conquer-Lord from assassinating the mayor and Marlene is captured during the fight.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-16 13:37:24. [CVDB16426] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 15:42:38. [Issue ID 29930]
